contents:
《纽约时报》报道过一对夫妻，丈夫是警察，妻子是抗议者
https://cn.nytimes.com/china/20190910/hong-kong-police-protests/

另一篇报道关于警察子女
https://www.hk01.com/%E7%A4%BE%E5%8D%80%E5%B0%88%E9%A1%8C/386185/%E8%AD%A6%E6%B0%91%E9%97%9C%E4%BF%82%E6%AF%8F%E6%B3%81%E6%84%88%E4%B8%8B-%E4%B8%89%E4%BD%8D%E8%AD%A6%E4%BA%8C%E4%BB%A3%E5%B7%A6%E5%8F%B3%E7%82%BA%E9%9B%A3%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%B6%E5%BA%AD%E6%8A%97%E7%88%AD

总的来说，游说太困难了
